Reviewer checklist
==============
- [ ] PR walkthrough with the author
- [ ] Understood the What, Why of the PR
- [ ] Verified all the test cases, especially the unhappy paths
- [ ] Default value of variables / Null Pointer Exception handling
- [ ] Appropriate retries for retriable failures
- [ ] Idempotency for retriable failures
